name: Charles Tang
title: Full-Stack Developer
author: Charles Tang
summary: Experienced Full-Stack Developer specializing in scalable, high-performance applications with over a decade in the industry. My work spans backend and frontend development in Java, ColdFusion, and Node.js, with strong expertise in single-page applications using React and TypeScript. Led the development of large-scale web apps for major events, delivered customized software solutions for top clients like HPE, SAP, and Informatica, and have proven skills in integrating and migrating legacy systems. My Career includes mentoring, API design, and implementing complex microservices architectures.

experience.description: Developed web applications using Node.js and ColdFusion, Java
Built responsive web app and migrated on C/S to B/S modern applications.
Developed backend solutions using multiple programming languages, including Java and ColdFusion.

education.degree: English as a second language and Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.school: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China
